text: Came here at 03 may at 1240h. Was served by Sales Assistant Yongcheng (sorry if i got the name wrong). He was very calm and patient to help me select the right shoes for my kids and even let me know the store's promotion. Left with a positive experience. Your sales assistant is definitely an asset to your brand.
Really impressed and grateful by the service from Shawn, no hardsell nor bad vibes from him. Easy going and patient to accommodate with my request.

I visited Adidas today in search of a pair of running shoes and was assisted by Sheila. She was highly knowledgeable and took the time to explain the differences between the various shoes I was interested in. I appreciated that she even highlighted the options with the biggest discounts, despite me ultimately choosing a more expensive pair. Thumbs up for her expertise and patient service!
Large selection, all the new items in stock, friendly and polite salespeople who will help you save money by telling you to install the application or register an account!
Thanks to Arrifin for his excellent service for the few times I purchased from the store, with the sizes I needed and explaining discounts available!
